entities.name: beauxbatons
entities.description: Beauxbatons is mentioned as a school that has horses, which require special care. It is introduced by Madame Maxime.

entities.name: durmstrang
entities.description: Durmstrang is mentioned alongside Beauxbatons, implying it is another school with magical creatures or horses that require special care.

entities.name: madame maxime
entities.description: Madame Maxime is introduced as the teacher from Beauxbatons who brings her students and horses to Hogwarts. She is described as confident in her ability to care for the horses.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is mentioned by Dumbledore as the Care of Magical Creatures teacher who will take care of Madame Maxime's horses. He is described as being 'well up to the job'.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is introduced as a wise and experienced teacher who is confident in Hagrid's ability to care for Madame Maxime's horses.

relationships.description: Madame Maxime is affiliated with Beauxbatons, as she brings her students and horses to Hogwarts.
Hagrid will care for Madame Maxime's horses at Hogwarts.
Dumbledore endorses Hagrid as the teacher who can take care of Madame Maxime's horses.
